column2:
df[] <- lapply(df, function(x) {
    if (is.character(x)) {
      # Escape LaTeX special characters
      x <- gsub("%", "\\\\%", x)
      x <- gsub("&", "\\\\&", x)
      x <- gsub("#", "\\\\#", x)
      x <- gsub("_", "\\\\_", x)
      x <- gsub("\\$", "\\\\$", x)
      x <- gsub("\\!", "\\\\!", x)
      x <- gsub("\\{", "\\\\{", x)
      x <- gsub("\\}", "\\\\}", x)

      # Fix curly quotes
      x <- gsub("[\u201C\u201D]", "\"", x) # “ ” to "
      x <- gsub("[\u2018\u2019]", "'", x)  # ‘ ’ to '

      # Optional: if you want to fix en-dashes/em-dashes too:
      # x <- gsub("\u2013|\u2014", "--", x) # – and — to double dash
    }
    x
  })
